parser

类 Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    An OPP parser of this calculator. It consists of an operator precedence table and a symbol stack.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Parser

        public Parser(java.lang.String expression)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor with the expression to be calculated. It will instantiate a scanner and a symbol stack. A dollar symbol marks the bottom of this stack.
        参数:
        expression - the expression to be calculated
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error occurs

    • 方法详细资料

      • parse

        public double parse()
             throws exceptions.LexicalException,
                    exceptions.SyntacticException,
                    exceptions.SemanticException
        The most important method provided by Parser. This method will do the whole job of parsing. Parser will get the next token by invoking the scanner's getNextToken method, and then look up the operator precedence table to judge whether it should shift or reduce. Note that the semantic behavior is embedded in reduce.
        返回:
        the result of this expression
        抛出:
        exceptions.LexicalException - if the expression has lexical error
        exceptions.SyntacticException - if the expression has syntax error
        exceptions.SemanticException - if the expression has semantic error

      • shift

        private void shift()
            throws exceptions.LexicalException
        Parser looks up the operator precedence table to judge whether it should do shift or reduce. This method will add the lookahead to the stack, and get the next token.
        抛出:
        exceptions.LexicalException - if the expression has lexical error

      • reduce

        private void reduce(int index)
             throws exceptions.SyntacticException,
                    exceptions.SemanticException
        Parser looks up the operator precedence table to judge whether it should do shift or reduce. This method will do the job of reducing according to the production referred by index.
        参数:
        index - used to refer to a spefici production
        抛出:
        exceptions.SyntacticException - if the expression has syntax error
        exceptions.SemanticException - if the expression has semantic error

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
